评论详情: The most amazing skirt! It's unique, well-made, and sturdy. I get so many compliments when I wear it. Get one - you will love it!

I'm 5'5" tall, 140 lbs. I could have easily gone with a small/medium instead of the large, but I wanted to made sure it was long enough. The length is perfect and I can adjust the waist since you tie it. Next time I might try one in small to see the actual difference. It's a thick skirt, sewn well and the colors are vibrant. The patchwork is beautiful, prettier in person. It doesn't look cheap. It can be dressed up or dressed down. I love this skirt and will be buying a second one. This skirt is 100% cotton. If you are going to wash it yourself, hand-wash it in cold water and lie it flat to dry it or most likely will shrink. I'll poetically rage it to my cleaners to have it professionally cleaned.
Beautiful design and nice linen fabric. I've received many compliments on it.
Fun
MY DAUGHTER LOVES WAYNE HER DRESS

The fabric is very nice, thicker than I expected. I was surprised at how nice the reverse side was. I may take a seam ripper and remove the tags so I can wear it as a reversible wrap skirt.  It’s a fun colorful skirt with plenty of fabric for modesty and the length was nice on me (I’m 5’7ish).

I now own this skirt in almost every color. I absolutely love it. The fit - very comfortable and the wrap waist ensures you can customize to your waist. The style - beautiful and flowy. I can dresss this up for the office or down for my weekend fun. The colors and patterns in the patchwork are awesome. I seriously wear these skirts all the time and I get so many compliments. I tell everyone to come here and order. Highly recommended. I will say they are delicate though. You can’t machine wash on a regular cycle and if you do machine wash, it will bleed color onto anything else you wash with it.
It's beautiful!! I love it - and love that I get compliments every time I wear it.

Great quality, heavy material. Pairs well with almost any top. I get lots of compliments
I love the look of this skirt, but the sewing is not done well and I've had to repair two failed seems already and have only worn it once.  Disappointing.

Quality of materials, workmanship outstanding. Colors are vivid as shown and the item comes with a tag explaining that these colors will most likely fade after washing, by hand btw, in cold water. I am 5'8", 150, the L/XL fits perfectly. Usually a size10/12 in jeans. Can't wait to pair with a sweater and boots. Love, love, love! Perfect Fall Fit!

True to size.  Great flow to fabric. Comfy to wear.

i literally get NEVER ENDINT COMPLIMENTS when i wear this skirt. It is my favorite thing in my wardrobe!! It’s so fun and flowy, and whole being a semi thick material, it keeps you cool in the summer while still being long past your knees!! (I’m 5’8 and tie it around my waist) absolutely worth the money and i will be buying different color swatches

Great fabric, comfortable and well made!
Love it
The material is so soft and comfortable. Absolutely love this skirt
The skirt was super cute! After I washed it and it dyed my washer red on the inside, I dried it to find out that it have fallen apart at the seams...

I bought this for my teenager whose whole aesthetic is what I would call Mad Max hippy! It's not happy hippy with tie dye, but grungy almost post-apocalyptic... That said, this skirt is very cool. It is a patchwork, not just printed fabric to look like patchwork. She loves it.

This skirt is everything I dreamed it would be!  The fabric is thick and feels like very good quality material. The colors are gorgeous, fun, and super vibrant. This skirt style could be styled multiple ways depending on season and occasion, winning huge points for versatility.  I'm a size large (12), and the L-XL fits me beautifully. I plan on buying a few more, as the quality is well worth the money.  Highly recommend these skirts! Couldn't be more pleased with my purchase!  **Update: I purchased another skirt, and the seam isn't sewn in several areas (I plan on sewing any areas that need it). But...at $40 each, a person shouldn't have to mend it upon taking it out of the package.  I wore the first skirt I ordered (the one pictured), and decided it needed to be washed. As per the care instructions, I hand washed it in cold water with a very small amount of mild detergent. The amount of color that it lost was alarming.  I'm sad. I absolutely love these skirts, but I'm really not feeling like these were worth the money now.  My advice to potential customers? If you're as in love with the style as I am, and still decide to order, go into it knowing that the color won't stay as vibrant and that you will likely need to sew seams.  My advice to the seller? Do better quality control and use better dyes. I promise you'll have more return customers.  Lowering my 5 star review to 3.

This is a “Just Buy It,” product. The patchwork is high quality, fits to size. It’s a great product that my wife can wear with anything. If your lady likes skirts, she will like the quality of this one.

I get nervous about wrap skirts and having enough coverage, so I bought the XXL just in case. It was more than enough, I could have got away with a L or XL. The fabric is beautiful and not cheaply made. Every time I wear it, I get multiple compliments throughout the day. So many nice colors, it goes with everything, regardless the tank top I throw on. I washed it on the gentle/handwash cycle, and let air dry. No issues. I just bought the rust/orange color and am excited to get it.

I’m a middle aged GenX deadhead who plumped up enough her old boho (hippie) garb no longer fit her. I also have an ileostomy and prefer skirts and dresses. Iykyk. I have tried so many skirts over the years and they’ve all failed. Too tight or too loose in the waist, too short, too clingy, too see through, or uncomfortable, etc. This skirt is the unicorn I’ve been looking for. 100% cotton? Check. Comfortable? Check check. Looks good? Checkity check check. I love that I control the way the waist fits due to it being a wrap skirt, and that it can shrink or expand depending on where my weight wanders (it fluctuates by about 15 to 20 lbs). I bought one, fell in love and bought another. Plan on buying one more. All hail the ultimate boho wrap skirt. My inner hippie is rejoicing.
This skirt is cute and comfortable. I've only washed once (on gentle) and it came out just great!

评论概述: Love this brand!  Authentic and beautiful.
评论详情: I love these skirts and this brand. I ordered two skirts from them. Real patchwork, beautiful colors and design. Made of a thick, warm cotton material that is great for cooler weather when I intended to wear them.  Very unique and authentic boho style, looks like they are hand-crafted and each one is an original. Wrap skirt is flattering and can be worn by many different sizes although the skirts are a bit long.  I am short and have to hike them up a bit. But this is always an issue for me (I’m 5’2”) and these just barely touch the floor so I am fine with them. Definitely recommended for anyone into this style.

Super cute and lightweight,  I thought it was going to be heavy, but is perfect. I didn't realize that it was a wrap around, probably my bad for not reading the details. But I'm still super happy with it and I'm pretty sure it's going to be one of my favorite skirts

Nice skirt but just too short for me.

I bough the xxl size worried at first that it wouldn’t be able to wrap around my body (I’m 336lbs and built like farm woman) however it went around perfectly and I’ve got no worry of flashing anyone something they shouldn’t be seeing. The material is very light weight but als very warm or cool depending on the weather. It can definitely trap hear but also is flowy enough to create a nice breeze. The material is also extremely soft.

I am in love with this skirt. It is beautifully made and has a good amount of fabric to wrap around, plus I like that it has a slit to put the belt through so that it stays up. It is a bit heavy, but still very comfortable.

I absolutely love this skirt. It is super flattering and I get comments on it anywhere I go. I wear about a size 10, or smaller (depending on the item) so I went with the small/med. I'm only 5'3" and with it tied at the waste it does not drag on the ground - which is astounding in itself! I have to pick it up while going up & down stairs but otherwise, no worries about tripping. It is a heavier material, well made, it's definitely a quality item. Seems like if taken care of it would last a really long time. 10/10 for me, highly recommend it!
